components.name: FastAPI CRUD Router
components.description: Standard FastAPI router with CRUD operations, pagination, filtering, and validation. LEGO-compatible: imports from library.common.types for ValidationResult.
components.example_usage:
from library.components.api.fastapi_router import CRUDRouter, create_crud_router
router = create_crud_router(model=Project, schema_create=ProjectCreate, schema_update=ProjectUpdate, schema_response=ProjectResponse, prefix='/projects', tags=['Projects'], get_db=get_db)

components.name: Pydantic Base Models
components.description: Common Pydantic models for FastAPI: pagination, error responses, timestamps, audit, health checks. LEGO-compatible: imports from library.common.types.
components.example_usage: from library.components.api.pydantic_base import PaginatedResponse, ErrorResponse, TimestampMixin, StatusEnum

components.name: Express Middleware Chain
components.description: Standard Express.js middleware setup: CORS, Helmet, rate limiting, request logging, error handling. TypeScript with consistent interface patterns.
